name: Chaotic Mess
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys game jam 2021.2.

The whole project was made in 1 week with C++ and SFML.

How to play:
  • Move with W, A, S, D
  • Shoot with the left mouse button
  • Change weapon with the right mouse button
  • Throw a teleport bullet with space (keep in mind that if the bullet hits a wall, you won't be teleported)
  • Picking up a yellow target gives you a short speed boost
How to run the game:

Once downloaded, unzip the folder and run Chaotic Mess.exe

Game startup issues:

There may or may not be a Windows security warning "Windows protected your PC" - this is because (I think) Windows doesn't trust any programs that don't have a verified author. In case that warning shows up, click on more info and run anyway to start the game.

Background music was made by Jonas Tyroller.
